description:
Ginjo gives Ichigo a day to decide whether to regain his lost Soul Reaper powers or not. But Ichigo, who no longer wishes to endanger anyone by being a Soul Reaper, decides to decline the offer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Creeping Danger in the Kurosaki Family?! Ichigo`s Confusion!
Kurosaki-ke ni Shinobiyoru Kiki!? Ichigo no Mayoi!
Un effrayant danger dans la famille Kurosaki. La confusion d`Ichigo
黒崎家に忍び寄る危機!? 一護の迷い!
